channel.title: Item commands
channel.description: how do i change item spawn commands? like on moparscape how it's ::pickup the id number, then the amount, how do i make it so all i have to do is type ::item instead of ::pickup ?

item.title: Item commands
item.dc:creator: @ironmaiden666 ironmaiden666
item.description:
@ironmaiden666 wrote:

i suggest you to use ::pickup

Read full topic

item.title: Item commands
item.dc:creator: @bmxscape bmxscape
item.description:
@bmxscape wrote:

To make it shorter so u dont always have to do ::pickup you could change it to like ::get (item id) (item amount) I think you could do it by doing this…

Search for else if (command.startsWith("pickup") && playerRights >= 2) { try { int newItemID = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(7,11)); int newItemAmount = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(12)); if (/*newItemID <= 10000 && */newItemID >= 0) { addItem(newItemID, newItemAmount); } else { sendMessage("No such item."); } } catch(Exception e) { sendMessage("Wrong Syntax! Use as ::pickup 0995 10"); }in client java.
replace it with this else if (command.startsWith("get") && playerRights >= 2) { try { int newItemID = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(7,11)); int newItemAmount = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(12)); if (/*newItemID <= 10000 && */newItemID >= 0) { addItem(newItemID, newItemAmount); } else { sendMessage("No such item."); } } catch(Exception e) { sendMessage("Wrong Syntax! Use as ::get 0995 10"); } if that doesnt work just delete it and if it works then

Read full topic
